None.Name: Tainted Voidcatcher
None.Description: Activate to redirect every enemy players' power refund to Willzapper's Voidnet.The affected player's power refund will no longer flow into his void but will be gatherd in the Voidnet for 30s. In order to reobtain the redirected power enemy players must first destroy Willzapper.While the effect lasts, hostile power refund from the void to actual power pool is additionally suppressed. Reusable every 60 seconds.
